about_the_game:
Create your transport company and get behind the wheel of your first truck, to deliver various cargoes between the multiple industries present on the map. Focus on large volumes, specialize in the most profitable cargoes, or respond to well-paid delivery missions: it's up to you to decide which strategy will be the best to make your business grow!
Build your own industries in the region, to make more profits or enrich the production chain with new and more profitable goods.
Play alone or up to 4 players, cooperating within the same company, or each running your own business, ready to take on the competition.

Features:
  • Play alone or up to 4 (cooperation or versus mode)
  • Buy the most suitable trucks for your goals. Extend the capacities of your trucks by hitching them to various transport trailers
  • Different types of cargo: bulk, liquids, crates, passengers and even heavy cargo requiring the use of a crane for loading / unloading
  • Dynamic economy based on supply and demand, including punctual high demands for specific goods
  • Complete paid transport contracts or choose the best delivery opportunities yourself based on the current price of resources
  • Manage your budget and monitor your operating costs to ensure the profitability of your activity
  • Invest in research and development to specialize your business and increase your profits
  • Set up your own industries to reduce your cargo purchasing costs or enrich the production chain with new resources
More features to come!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: Experience the life of a trucker, delivering cargo between various industries. Feed the most valuable production lines or fulfill contracts to earn enough money to own the largest fleet of trucks among your friends, or start your own industries to maximize your profits.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Ukrainian, Simplified Chinese
